historia.title: Cristo Rey
historia.subtitle: Discover the origins and legacy of this iconic monument.
historia.historyParagraph1: The Cristo Rey monument is one of the most recognized tourist spots in the region. Built in 1953, this site offers an incredible panoramic view of the city of Cali.
historia.historyParagraph2: Designed as a symbol of peace, the monument stands 26 meters tall and attracts thousands of visitors every year, who admire not only its architecture but also its natural surroundings.

animal1.name: Squirrel Monkey
animal1.info: The squirrel monkey is an agile and curious primate that lives in the treetops.

animal2.name: Smooth-beaked Garrapatero
animal2.info: The smooth-beaked Garrapatero stands out for its fine beak, ideal for capturing insects.

animal3.name: Long-tongued Bat
animal3.info: The long-tongued bat uses its elongated tongue to feed on nectar and fruits.

animal4.name: Olinguito
animal4.info: The olinguito is a small nocturnal mammal, a relative of raccoons, that lives in tropical forests.

animal5.name: Masked Hummingbird
animal5.info: The masked hummingbird is a tiny bird with a specialized beak for sucking nectar.

animal6.name: Saffron Canary Sicalis

animal7.name: Tarantula

animal8.name: Tayra

animal9.name: Red-headed Torito

animal10.name: Flying Tororoi

animal11.name: Collared Trogon
